thread.title: Bernie Sanders to pit his bulldog debate style against Clinton

author: wn.com
title: Bernie Sanders to pit his bulldog debate style against Clinton
text: WASHINGTON (Reuters) - Bernie Sanders, Hillary Clintonâ€™s biggest rival for the Democratic presidential nomination, is a novice to the bright lights of prime-time television, but politicians who have sparred with him in the past predict he will be a tenacious brawler in their party's debate on Oct. 13.
